caller_intent: The caller (Alex) wanted to clarify confusion about a workers' comp insurance renewal bill of $3,000 and discuss options to pay it in installments instead of a lump sum.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the caller's confusion about the $3,000 renewal bill and explained it was a 25% down payment for the renewal.
Agent proposed changing the billing account to a 10-equal-payment plan to reduce the immediate amount owed.
Caller agreed to proceed and provided bank routing and account numbers for EFT setup.
Agent planned to contact Travelers to adjust the payment plan and process the payment once confirmed.
Caller requested setting up auto-draft to avoid future delays.
knowledge_required: Payment plan options for insurance renewals
summary: Alex contacted Cody to resolve confusion about a $3,000 workers' comp renewal bill. Cody explained it was a 25% down payment and arranged a 10-installment plan. Alex provided banking details for EFT setup and agreed to auto-draft payments to avoid delays. Cody planned to contact Travelers to finalize the payment plan adjustments.
